docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Gerneral
docs.text: Variable Default Description BASE_URL  REQUIRE_SIGNUP_CODE true Allow use sigup without token SIGNUP_CODE_LIFETIME 24 The time in hours a signup code is usbale EMAIL_REQUIRE_VERIFICATION false Require users to click a varification link in an E-Mail. ENVIRONMENT prod

docs.title: Security
docs.text: Variable Default Description ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRATION_HOURS 192 The time in hours a token is valid SECRET_KEY

docs.title: Database
docs.text: Variable Default Description POSTGRES_SERVER  POSTGRES_PORT 5432 POSTGRES_USER  POSTGRES_PASSWORD  POSTGRES_DB nightdrive

docs.title: E-Mail
docs.text:
SMTP server setup.

Variable Default Description SMTP_TLS true SMTP_SSL false SMTP_PORT 587 SMTP_HOST SMTP_USER SMTP_PASSWORD SMTP_FROM_EMAIL SMTP_FROM_NAME

docs.title: App
docs.text:
App Development

No mayor app development will take place until the API has reached version 0.0.1.
